name: LeapFroggy
description: Leapfroggy is a multi-level platformer that appeals to people of all ages. This is because the game's mechanics are easy enough for a child to play while also challenging enough to keep older kids and adults entertained. Children who play the game will develop problem-solving skills as well as learn how to count using the in-game scoring system. No prior video game experience is needed to play the game, just load the game and have fun!
